titles.title: FAA Extension, Safety, and Security Act of 2016
Aviation Security Act of 2016
Providing for the concurrence by the House in the Senate amendments to H.R. 636, with amendments.
FAA Extension, Safety, and Security Act of 2016

action.text: Mr. Shuster moved to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H. Res. 818.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Sets forth the rule for consideration of the Senate amendment to H.R. 636 (Federal Aviation Administration Reauthorization Act of 2016).
